ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 1075
ygData.msgSnippet:
oh it was a blast..... literally lol. when I mentioned it in guild chat and
tells to a couple of friends we ended up with a 68 wizzy, 65magi, 67 pally,
70 sk,
ygData.messageBody:
oh it was a blast..... literally lol. when I mentioned it in guild chat and tells to a couple of friends we ended up with a 68 wizzy, 65magi, 67 pally, 70 sk, me and 3 other beasts from 60-70 killing the whole area. we rounded up a bunch of newbies in Freeport, Everfrost,  and BB zones and took them to EC, sat them on the sand dune behind the single building on the path and let them run down and loot what they wanted for a couple of hours. had some of the evil races in Ferrott as well helping those out.... they got some nice little twink stuff and we got paybacks for when they killed our low alts at the anniversary
 
Mistress Flaumigavylke 64 BST
Silver Tears of Flame
Quellious
-------Original Message-------
 
From: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Date: 11/03/04 18:24:25
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 1075
 
OUCH! Yes, that would be a very sizable drop! However it was fun!



EverQuest@yahoogroups.com wrote:

> Message: 2        
>    Date: Wed, 3 Nov 2004 09:55:37 -0700 (Mountain Standard Time)
>    From: "flaumigevylke" <flaumigevylke@...>
> Subject: Re: New, lost, confused, aiyee....
>
> yea they hurt even us highers, I was throwing heals on a warrior and shadow
> knight that were getting mobbed and ended up with theirs and mine on me. we
> got lucky they lived and sun came up with me at 7%hp.... heck of a drop from
> 5689 self buffed and V. for a bunch of greens they hurt a lot when they gang
> up on you
> 
> Mistress Flaumigavylke 64 BST
> Silver Tears of Flame
> Quellious
